mapper.select: SELECT *,REPLACE((SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(mayday_category.category_name) from mayday_category where category_id in(SELECT category_id FROM mayday_article_category WHERE article_id=a.id) ),',',' ') categorys ,REPLACE((SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(mayday_tag.tag_name) FROM mayday_tag WHERE tag_id in (SELECT tag_id FROM mayday_article_tag WHERE article_id = a.id)),',',' ') tags FROM mayday_article a
